title: 黑影中的工具盒
content:
[!--
如果你是来这查代码的，我建议你还是直接私信问我吧。
--]

[[include :scpsandboxcn:blackinblack hide=a]]

[[iftags 作者]]
[[module ListPages name="{$name}" category="-deleted"]]
[[div style="margin-top: 2px;"]]
[[div class="bibhide"]]
[[div cl{$tale}ss="bibshow"]]
++++++ %%title_linked%%
[[/div]]
[[div cl{$scp}ss="bibshow"]]
++++++ %%title_linked%% - {$title}
[[/div]]
[[div cl{$sscp}ss="bibshow"]]
++++++ %%title_linked%% - {$title}[[footnote]] [[*user {$user}]]推荐语：“{$tui}” [[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[size larger]]
[[div class="inline-colmod"]]
[[div class="bibhide"]]
[[div cl{$excerpt}ss="bibshow"]]
[[include component:coltop show=节选|hide=|nohide=true]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
{$jie}
[[/div]]
[[include component:colend]]
[[/div]]
[[div cl{$jp}ss="bibshow"]]
（[http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/%%fullname%% 日译]）
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
共%%rating_votes%%人评分
[[include :fendsfox:component:rating-bar-main]]
%%tags%%
[[/size]]
最近编辑：{{**%%updated_by_linked%%**}}@@    @@时间：{{**%%updated_at%%**}}
最近评论：{{**%%commented_by_linked%%**}}@@    @@时间：{{**%%commented_at%%**}}
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
.bibhide{
    display: none;
}
.bibshow{
    display: block !important;
}
[[/module]]
[[/iftags]]
author: blackinblack
